creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: lined in blue; black with side vents and curved lower edge; sleeves have multicolored floral embroidery in green, pink, off-white and brown, with white twill cuffs; neck opening border of similar embroidery and appliques; white stand-up collar; circular lower edge front and back--long embroidered thread multicolored floats attached by tape; one small section of lining is rayon
title: Jacket
